d1: Welcome to the first day of the rest of your *Afterlife*!
There's a few ^troublemakers^ trying to sneak past *Afterlife Security*! Click on them to send 'em right back!
d2: Wanted posters can have multiple criteria
Only click on people who match every category in a wanted poster
d3: Some troublemakers can only be identified by their body temperature
Use this new ^dual window technolgy^ to see body temperature
d4: To identify these intruders, make sure they have the right clothes AND temperature
d5: Some troublemakers can be identified by their personal belongings
In your thermal camera, press the new button to switch to x-ray mode
d6: Now, you will need to use both thermal and x-ray mode
Press the camera buttons to switch between them
d7: Now, we will bestow upon you our final invention: the ^soul viewer^.
With this tool, you can see the quality of each soul
